scripts.copy-readme: cp ./README.md ./dist/libs/core && cp ./README.md ./dist/libs/angular && cp ./README.md ./dist/libs/angular-router && cp ./README.md ./dist/libs/rxjs && cp ./README.md ./dist/libs/ngxs && cp ./README.md ./dist/libs/ngrx && cp ./README.md ./dist/libs/react
scripts.copy-changelog: cp ./Changelog.md ./dist/libs/core && cp ./Changelog.md ./dist/libs/angular && cp ./Changelog.md ./dist/libs/angular-router && cp ./Changelog.md ./dist/libs/rxjs && cp ./Changelog.md ./dist/libs/ngxs && cp ./Changelog.md ./dist/libs/ngrx && cp ./Changelog.md ./dist/libs/react
scripts.bump-version:major: npm version major --force && cd libs/core && npm version major --force && cd ../angular && npm version major --force && cd ../angular-router && npm version major --force && npm version major --force && cd ../rxjs && npm version major --force && cd ../ngxs && npm version major --force && cd ../ngrx && npm version major --force && cd ../react && npm version major --force
scripts.bump-version:minor: npm version minor --force && cd libs/core && npm version minor --force && cd ../angular && npm version minor --force && cd ../angular-router && npm version minor --force && cd ../rxjs && npm version minor --force && cd ../ngxs && npm version minor --force && cd ../ngrx && npm version minor --force && cd ../react && npm version minor --force
scripts.bump-version:patch: npm version patch --force && cd libs/core && npm version patch --force && cd ../angular && npm version patch --force && cd ../angular-router && npm version patch --force && cd ../rxjs && npm version patch --force && cd ../ngxs && npm version patch --force && cd ../ngrx && npm version patch --force && cd ../react && npm version patch --force
scripts.build:lib-pack: ng build core --prod && ng build angular --prod && ng build angular-router --prod && ng build rxjs --prod && ng build ngxs --prod && ng build ngrx --prod && ng build react --prod && npm run copy-files && cd dist/libs/core && npm pack && cd ../angular && npm pack && cd ../angular-router && npm pack && cd ../rxjs && npm pack && cd ../ngxs && npm pack && cd ../ngrx && npm pack && cd ../react && npm pac
scripts.commit-git: git commit -m "build: adds new release" && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.docs:publish: ng build docs --prod && cp ./apps/docs/src/404.html ./dist/apps/docs/ && find ../state-adapt.github.io -mindepth 1 ! -path '../state-adapt.github.io/.git' ! -path '../state-adapt.github.io/.git/*' ! -path '../state-adapt.github.io/versions' ! -path '../state-adapt.github.io/versions/*' -exec rm -rf {} + && cp -R ./dist/apps/docs/* ../state-adapt.github.io && cd ../state-adapt.github.io && git add . * && git commit -m 'Update' && git push origin master
